name: Jiawei Jiang
content: Jiawei Jiang's Resume About me I am a full professor in School of Computer Science of Wuhan University. I obtained my Ph.D in Computer Science from Peking University in 2018, M.Sc from University of Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2014, and B.Sc from University of Science Technology of China in 2011 respectively. And I worked in Data Platform Department of Tencent as a senior researcher from 2018 to 2019, and a postdoc researcher in Department of Computer Science of ETH Zürich from 2019 to 2022. Education Research interests: Big data processing and analysis, distributed machine learning, distributed optimization Thesis: Distributed Gradient Optimization of Machine Learning Algorithm Research interests: Multimedia on mobile devices, near duplicate video retrieval, web crawler, network load balancing Thesis: Research and Implementation of Video Aggregation and Multi-Screen Service System Thesis: Implementation of Distributed Load Balance System on Nginx Employment Publications - Jiawei Jiang, Yusong Hu, Xiaosen Li, Wen Ouyang, Zhitao Wang, Fangcheng Fu, Bin Cui.
